contest-event.event-date:
Jan. 31, 1982 D Rochdale Contest (Section A)
Rochdale Contest (Section A) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
rochdale-contest-section-a
None
Rochdale Town Hall, Rochdale, Greater Manchester, England, UK Hymn tune contest (£15 and trophy) - 1st Lockwood. Prizes - 1st £200 and trophy, 2nd £150 and shield, 3rd £75 and trophy, 4th £50 and shield. 12 bands competed.
June 17, 2014, 9:48 a.m. Oct. 13, 2016, 10:06 a.m.
1 Vernon Building Society (Poynton) Brass Band Alan Lawton
2 Lockwood Band (Huddersfield) Paul McCann John O'Gaunt [Vinter]
3 Dobcross Silver Band Les Beevers
4 Stacksteads Brass Band Edward Tarling
Unknown Result Boarshurst Silver Band Bryan Garside Tournament for Brass
Unknown Result Warburtons Bakery Band John Durrant Diadem of Gold
Unknown Result Rockingham Band Graham O'Connor
Unknown Result Askern Colliery Band Steve Sykes
Unknown Result Unite the Union (City of Sheffield) David Hirst
